name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-office-offer-creation
title: SharePoint document generator - Offer Creation (SPFx)
shortDescription: This sample is a Teams personal Tab to act as a Microsoft 365 across application (Teams, Outlook, Office) to generate docuemnts.
longDescription: This sample is a Teams personal Tab to act as a Microsoft 365 across application (Teams, Outlook, Office) to generate docuemnts. It is realized with SharePoint Framework (SPFx).

thumbnails.alt: Create Offer Form with FluentUI controls
Created Offer result with filled metadata opened in Word

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
